main_definition: Surgeons are medical professionals who specialize in performing surgical procedures to treat various health conditions.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A person skilled in surgery, specifically a doctor trained to perform operations on patients
meanings_and_examples.example: The experienced surgeon expertly performed the intricate heart bypass surgery.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An increase or sudden rise in activity, often referring to patient admissions or emergencies handled by surgeons
meanings_and_examples.example: There was a surge of patients at the clinic due to an accident on the nearby highway.
